Package turing.communication

Interface Payload

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    JsonPayload, StringPayload
    public interface Payload
extends java.io.Serializable
    Abstraction representing the content of a message. Must be serializable in order to be shipped through the network.

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      default byte[] bytes()  
      java.lang.String formatted()  

    • Method Detail

      • formatted

        java.lang.String formatted()
        Returns:
        a formatted version of the payload

      • bytes

        default byte[] bytes()
        Returns:
        the payload content as a byte array
